item.description:
Sunday brunch at the Dakota is always great, so plan to join us. We'll meet at the Dakota on the Silas Deane Highway, Exit 24 from I-91 (you can see the sign from the highway).

Sunday Brunch is lovely in a relaxed setting. A great place to enjoy Sunday's with friends, family or each other over a meal. Brunch at Dakota offers something for everyone.

Brunch Includes:
Assorted Juices, Coffee & Tea
Fresh Seasonal Fruits
Omelettes Made-to-Order
Homemade Belgian Waffles
Bacon & Sausage
Home-Fried Potatoes
Assorted Cold Cereals
Our Farm-Fresh Salad Bar
Carving Stations
Assorted Hot Entr√©es
Smoked Seafood
Assorted Cheeses and Cold Cuts
Cakes, Pies & Candies & More!

Adult brunch is $19.95 and that includes the all you can eat buffet as well as your coffee or juice. Kids are $8.95.

This a busy place for brunch so we will need to make a reservation. For that reason, no "maybe" responses will be allowed and RSVP's must be made by June 11.
item.name: Sunday Brunch
